Hi Everyone,

   I am trying to connect to a AIX (UNIX) server, and i changed the daemom port to connect via 21. But still when i try to connect it, it tell me that i connectiong fail at "Failed to connect to the daemon on SPOON using port 4035 with an unexpected exception". the 4035 is what is set as default, does this prefence not work or what? has any body tested this? If is this a error in error representation or are the preferences not getting carried around. Please let me know? 

here is stack trace.

org.eclipse.rse.services.clientserver.messages.SystemMessageException: Failed to connect to the daemon on SPOON using port 4035 with an unexpected exception
at org.eclipse.rse.connectorservice.dstore.DStoreConnectorService.internalConnect(DStoreConnectorService.java:1028)

at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)


Thanks,
Pratik
